data.text: At this point I can't get passed the screen that's green with a white $ in the middle. Can't click anything. All started after updating. They claim its my device which is a newer device and was just fine until yesterday. I try to access online, but I don't get anywhere. I call and they keep saying the same thing. Update I called to close account, and the gentleman I talked to said it wasn't my phone and sent it higher up. Update again they reached out and are working on it.

data.text: Easy to use app to pay or request money and keep track of everything. Easily displays your accumulated balance, which can be easily transferred to your bank account. If there are no or insufficient funds, you simply withdraw them from your connected bank account. What I don't like is that I don't like to see other people's transactions between your connections, which means others can also see mine, so you need to be careful with your transaction descriptions or change your privacy settings

data.text: I'm in the US yet this app continuously says "cash not available in your region" extremely inconvenient when it happens randomly without rhyme or reasoning. (Added later) I don't wanna go to support literally every time the app doesn't work right, just make an app that works 100% of the time. Venmo doesn't have this problem. Maybe yall could take some notes from them.

data.text: Great services, not great customer service. Things I enjoy about the app are the automatic round-up savings, interest-earning savings account, overdraft protection, the "Borrow" feature, and ease of sending and receiving money. Unfortunately things I cannot recommend this app for, in particular, is paying for hotels that have security deposits (that are later supposed to come off, but take forever), and the customer service via Chat, which was frankly rude despite my attempts to be courteous.
data.replyText: We understand the importance of your funds and how inconvenient it can be when you don't receive the support that you were expecting. data.text: Best online money app I've ever used. Even though they take a dollar every time you put money on your card through a store or transfer it from your cash app to your bank it's a small price to pay for the very non-restrictive limitations otherwise in play. I absolutely adore the ability to lock and unlock the account at my own will. That is very "clutch" at repelling those extra or repeat charges for subscriptions you don't really want to be a part of but sometimes forget to cancel.
data.replyText: Hey Daniel, thank you sharing your experience about how you feel with Cash App. We hope you never need it, but always feel comfortable using this link to get in touch with us if you ever require assistance: https://help.cash.app/3128.

data.text: Pretty good app, my credit is shot to the point I generally can't find many banks that will allow me to open an account thanks to a former guardian opening several credit based accounts in my name that I haven't been able to fix just yet. However if I don't update the app, which I have to do manually as I'm never on wifi due to rural living, the app absolutely bugs out. Crashes, lag, and especially transferring to savings. I have no pin set for transferring in, and I still have to use my pin.

data.text: All and all pretty solid app. It does what its supposed to do, with little to no . For some reason though the app shortcut dissapeared from my screens..meaning i cannot access it with ease of clickjng the icon. My brovada shortcut did the same thing at the same time but those are the only 2 apps that have done that which leads me to believe the issue is connected. I have to open up playstore, search cash app, select cash app and then im good . Extremely inconvenient & annoying

data.text: I was going to help a family member so I installed. The setup was easy. I will give the app that much. I sent to the family member and somehow, there were about five transactions on my account - not one even though I only did the transfer one time and the transfer was declined so my family member didn't get what they needed. I am now having to keep a very very very close eye on my account because of this. This was very inconvenient. I will uninstall if this issue becomes a big problem.

data.text: Excellent app for financial payments and transfers. Simple, easy to use and efficient. I give 3 stars and not 5 because I think now that they have done a good job in the checking account industry they should take the next step and offer a card or a system to help build credit. That was one star deduction and the second star deduction is because when there is fraud or someone hacking Into your account, customer service is basically non existent and they need to do more to correct issues with it.

data.text: Fairly good money app. Easy to use to add or transfer money however the customer service is absolutely awful. I have never had any major issues with the app till recently. Customer service reps border on the line of being rude and condescending. I have been trying to have my name changed (since I got married) for a month now. Any time I inquire I am told it's being worked on and thats all they can say.

data.text: Cashapp makes all my electronic transfers and transactions simple and easy. It's great for setting aside a personal savings account and it's great that it doesn't rip you off with all the fines, fees and maintenance costs like so many other financial institutions and services. The small but secure exclusive Crypto, E-Coins and Bit Stock trading capability within the app is a great way for someone who has no experience in the entire Crypto Coin Wallet scene. It would be to be able to transfer.
data.replyText: Thank you so much for taking the time to provide us with this great feedback, Milton. We are happy to see that you are enjoying Cash App! Keep in mind that we're just a message away in case you need our help: https://cash.app/contact.

data.text: Amazing app everything is great in almost every way however if you do have a problem customer service is not helpful in the slightest most of the time they are automated and don't even know what to say except the script put in front of them however I think they should add more to the savings account like different spots to save for different things and not just saving for one thing at a time.

data.text: it is a good all around app with new features and really makes it simple to send and recieve money. The only issue I have is when a old account can't be accessed if you have lost all access to the account and you can't get back to it unless you verify with the email that you can't get into because of loss of email access or the phone number that you might not have any longer.. other than that it's a GREAT APP

data.text: This app is so great. I’ve been a member of Cash app for a REALLY long time, and have had nothing but mostly good experiences. However, this latest update is pure rage fuel. Every time I put the app in the background even for a split second, it takes me back to the top of my feed. If I open a reel to watch it, I cant back out of it without it going to the top of my feed and then I lose the rest of the reels, or have to scroll endlessly to get back to them. This "feature" has GOT to go.

data.text: The app could be a little easier to use and has a few glitches from time to time, but otherwise it's a great app to use and it's convenient because it keeps all your cards in one place and you can use them all from one place. It would be better if they offered tap and go service, and if it didn't cost as much to send money to new pickups as cash in a store! But it has some cool features that similar apps don't have, like offering beneficial organization creation and package tracking.

data.text: Love this app, it is so convenient and fast most of the time. My only complaint; for those of us that religiously use this app and it's instant cash feature, it would be better if they offered a 'premium' option, where the instant cash fees would be waived for a few bucks a month. I'd gladly pay that and I'm sure others would too. I know you can get a card and not pay the fee but I don't need anymore cards haha. If this was changed the app would be almost perfect.

data.text: So I've noticed that any tiny amount left in my card keeps disappearing. For example, I had eight dollars, saved that for a while, went to see, and money is down to 0. I get paid through the cash app from work, so it's pretty unfair. I always pay back when I can, when I barrow, and there's a setting for that I pay manually. I've also checked any subscription, but they all get paid, and I don't owe it. So either cash app thinks I don't know, I have a bit of money left and takes it.

data.text: ever since they made an actual customer support team, cash app is everything a person unable to get a bank could hope for as far as paperless, quick convenient wireless transfers, direct deposits, tax refunds (with free tax filling!!) and atm withdrawals, Bitcoin, stocks and investing options& guidance., plus now even offering overdraft and paycheck advances! cashapp surely has grown and evolved since I first had signed up for this company in 2012!! & so far, still easily my goto default

data.text: Great! For the past couple months, this app has simply worked. Loading in at any given time will show a black screen with the loading circle, but nothing loads. Either that or it will show the last tweets you looked at and not refresh them or allow you to go into the replies. You can't go in your dms or search or anything else, it will just be frozen on each tab. Refreshing the app does not help and it doesn't load sometimes until 10-30 minutes later. This happens multiple times a day as well.

data.text: Well designed UI, higher than average fees on ATM withdrawal and bitcoin buy/sell orders, responsive customer support. The most significant bug I've encountered is that the app often ignores the security settings, allowing access to the app without a PIN, even when my settings clearly state that access should require a PIN. The most significant missing feature is that it doesn't allow you to link more than one bank.
data.replyText: Hi Mark, we understand that fees is never welcomed, and we can certainly take a look here. Our current fees are always listed in our Terms of Service: https://squ.re/cashapptos. If you have further concerns, feel free to reach out to us here: https://cash.app/contact.

data.text: Extremely easy to use. Even filled my taxes for the first time ever with this app and got my full return plus $248 I didn't know about! They didn't shut my account down for having a negative balance for 2 months, paid it off no fees at all. Only one issue. I file said taxes on a different device and no longer have that email address. I cannot get to my tax documents. I feel like they would shoot me to keep me from my own paperwork! Great security for sure but sheesh.
data.replyText: Thanks for taking the time to share your experience with us, Jason. We know how important it is for you to file your taxes. Our team will be willing to give you a better help, please feel free to contact us to solve your issues:http://help.cash.app/3128.

data.text: For stocks, the app does not update the UI properly after showing notification that something is bought or sold. To make it worse, there is no way to force a refresh. So while I know a trade went through, I am stuck with a UI showing (invalid) pending orders and the only way to update is to force close the app and reopen it. Edit: Dropping the rating to 1 star because 2 version updates after I reported the issue, the app still crashes when displaying a long list on a particular screen.

data.text: Beware! This app functions well with small transactions but I recently made a large transaction and the money was deducted and posted to my bank account within minutes. For 4 days now I haven't been able to use my bank account because cash app still has a pending charge hold on my account. I've not been able to pay bills or anything due to the large deficit in my account. Called customer service and was told, 'I've already told you this is not on our end, I'm ending this call". RUDE!

data.text: BEWARE; expect bottom of the barrel customer service. First the chatbot responded with nothing more than a single "." after having me go through a bunch of preliminary steps, including transferring money to cashapp. Then in the morning, while politely trying to handle the issue over the phone, they gave a response that was difficult to understand (because of the language barrier), and then promptly hung up! Twice!! I've used the other cash transfer apps for years without a single problem.

data.text: Love trading with the app. Site/App is simple to use, and it rarely crashes. This is a very cool and perfect app. The most user-friendly cryptocurrency exchange to date. I've tried a few, and they can be challenging to use because of how difficult it is to meet their payment requirements merely to acquire some cryptocurrency. So far, it's great! It can be bothersome that the app is updated frequently and that each update causes it to stop functioning until a new version is downloaded and install
data.replyText: We're delighted to hear that your experience using Cash App has been a good one, Dave. We are working every day to improve our services. Don't forget we're always here to help if you need us: https://help.cash.app/3128.

data.text: THE BEST way to monitor your credit status with two of the three credit bureaus. Immediate notification if a credit inquiry is made. FASTER than the paid service I WAS using and more precise in the details. The features also keep track of your auto loans and home loans. Also keep track of your car's value. Special offers from credit card companies and promotional offers. It is updated frequently with email notifications that something has changed in your report. Sometimes even daily changes.

CashApp is a platform who's mobile interface feels really disjointed. As if they were adding on features as they were going but didn't think about the way they were doing it. Another annoying aspect about the platform is the fact the web interface has some serious limitations. Notably the ability to accept a payment using the web interface. The platform needs improvement. And so does the app!

data.text: Fine. I am extremely felt confused. The last update mixed up my ability to open links in the app when sent to me by friends...ie, from fb or reels. I've tried everything under the sun to fix this, and nothing is working. I've always been able to open links sent to me in messages within whatsapp. I've reached out to whatsapp help and no solution or help. You guys created a ticket but no response! I don't want to have to delete the app and reinstall bc I refuse to backup my chats to Google!

A cash deposit was sent to a bank savings account never linked to my cash app account (although the checking acct at that bank had previously linked) instead of the account I selected (for standard deposit, not instant). When I made inquiry about how that could happen, instead of answering the question, they reversed the deposit saying it would go back to my cash app account, but it did not. Customer service is non-existent at this point.

data.text: I love this app I just wish there were more options to choose from for the recurring deposits such as bi-weekly and every other week and able to choose the day for the automatic deposit. data.text: Daily fraudulent attempts with a card that was replaced and reported stolen 2 years ago. And even with all security measures taken, somehow, my account has gone negative even though none of the transactions actually went through. data.text: Great. I enjoy sending money, chats, and stories with friends, but all the updates continue to suck. As of today, the creepy AI character can no longer be hidden from my chats and is the top "person" listed. I wish I could delete the character from my friends list completely. The public stories being suggested are annoying and not something I want to watch. Picking a filter is always an issue because as I scroll through them, it disappears or stops on a random one and won't let me change it.

The service is great, an amazing convenience. You are able to add money at any time, anywhere, and almost any amount. (Everyone has limits due to liabilities.) The only thing is security could be just a little tighter. As far as like when you have a charge that pops up and it's the first time, there should be a two step verification. They do after a few times. My case they hit 3 times equal to $1200.00 before it was flagged. Overall amazing service.

data.text: Awesome app. This is a great app with many offer but you only get 6 skips and hour (I think) which is so annoying. It also removed the heart for liked songs into a plus sign which I don't like, Please change that back if possible. The app also told me once that I can't choose any more songs and will have to come the next day to play songs of my choice. This app irritates me so often. Most of the songs either show "We don't have lyrics for this one" or "Unable to load lyrics" something like that.

Stalling issues!! I was perfectly fine with this app but lately(maybe a month or so) it has been having a difficult time loading. I've uninstalled twice & still can't get into the app. Frustrating to say the least! Re: In response to the developer... I have the app set for automatic updating, that isn't the issue but thank u. Update 1/8....ive gotten use to uninstalling & reinstalling. DON'T WASTE UR TIME, this app is not getting better. Bring back the old, I had not one issue with it.

data.text: Great service for moving money, getting paid, and bridging the gap between crypto and standard currency. data.text: Difficult to use. Cannot transfer to multiple accounts. Be careful, they trick you by showing "instant" at the bottom with a fee making it look like your transfer is set to instant. If you select it thinking it's an option for the transfer it immediately selects instant and they steal a huge fee. That's they're way of tricking you into using the fee based. Scammers.

data.text: CashApp is the best, easiest, most simple card you can get. It's better than any debit card you can get, there's no hidden fees, they don't charge you to add money, they don't charge any monthly fees, it's free, and the App is simple and easy to use and navigate, and there's so many useful features. Savings Account, Regular Account, send and receive money to others with cashapp or send and receive money from other banks too. Plus you can customize your card when you order it. Def. Recommend it!
data.replyText: We’re so glad to hear you’re enjoying Cash App and appreciate you taking the time to leave this nice review, Eric. If you ever need assistance, we’ll be here to help at: https://help.cash.app/3128. Have a wonderful day!

data.text: very handy and easy to use. one good thing is that you can transfer into cashapp instantly from your debit card without a fee. PayPal charges a fee for instant transfers. the problems are; you can only attach 1 bank account, 1 debit card, and 1 credit card (instead of multiple, like PayPal/ Venmo). Also, there's always a fee to withdraw at atms, unless you get direct deposit (even if they're in-network atms).

data.text: If I could rate 10 stars I would. I can't say enough good things about Cash App! I use it for all my banking needs. I get paid 3 days early, I save money with roundups, my ATM fees are reimbursed and now I have $50 free overdraft protection! Love this app more than PayPal or Venmo. So easy to send and receive $. No waiting for verification or anything. And almost everyone is on cash app. Super easy to look people up whether or not they are on your contact list

data.text: App is one of the worst if these kinds. Someone sends you money, does not let you select which account to send it to. Trying to track down where the money is headed us a pain. Support is limited. Adding accounts has been a bit difficult at times. Basically if you want to send money back and forth with someone, go with a different app, lot better ones out there. Update: Cash app still has not resolved the issue. 1/27/2024. Article provides no help to the issues.
data.replyText: We hear your concerns Matthew, and we're here to help. There are 2 options to deposit funds: Instant can be made to your linked debit card and Standard go directly to your bank account. Check out this article for more details:http://help.cash.app/1012. We'd be glad to have a look at this with you. Feel free to contact us: https://cash.app/contact.

data.text: VERY simple money App. If you think Venmo is confusing, cash app is perfect for your mentally disabled kids to use as it has very few features and options. You can't really screw it up. Unless you try to deposit money into your bank. Then it doesn't tell you which bank it's going to and you have to find the list of attached banks and I guess it takes from the one on top of the list. Weird why they won't tell you which account before you hit send.

Would be 5 stars because it's very easy to use and rarely have I come across any issues regarding it. However it doesn't allow me to send money to certain people with a pop up saying payment cancelled for my own protection, even when I verified it was whom I was needing to receive my payment. Have been able to in the past until one day I just couldn't anymore. I can send, it'll say pending until they accept and once they do it is cancelled.
data.replyText: Hi Joe, thank you for sharing this with us! Occasionally a Cash App payment will be returned to the sender as part of our ongoing commitment to keeping the app safe and secure for all our customers. If you've had ongoing trouble then we'd definitely like to take a closer look with you. Just get in touch here: https://help.cash.app/3128

data.text: Delays "instant" transfers that they charge for, closes accounts without explanation and essentially tells you to quit reaching out with your question;when I persist they say they can't find a reason. It was nice and dandy for the first 2 years with minimal issues but now with a 'new owner' or whatever, it's completely wrong and essentially has false advertising about it being a convenient tool. It'd be easier if they advertised it as a cash trash, lose your money here.
data.replyText: It’s important to us that we improve to make your experience better, Carrie. Feel free to contact us here: https://cash.app/contact.

data.text: I've been very happy with the app in the past, but some things just do not seem to function correctly. The search transaction bar has been very flaky lately. Sometimes it works other times, it doesn't. There have been multiple days during the last few months where you will have to go 48 hours straight with malfunctioning send cash errors. I hope they get this stuff under control because I believe these bugs are fixable. I think this is a great banking app, otherwise.
data.replyText: Hey Brian, certainly this sounds strange, we'd recommend making sure that your device's operating system is up-to-date. If needed, you can always access your account from a web browser at Cash.app/. If you're still having trouble, just message us here: https://help.cash.app/3128

data.text: I use this app sparingly, maybe 4-5 time a month if that. However, there's one technical issue I've been having for awhile now. Everytime I attempt to put more money in, red lettering pops up saying there is a "connectivity issue". I've used data and Wi-Fi to try and get it to work. I've uninstalled and reinstalled, but that hasn't helped either. I almost can't use it at this point.

data.text: It's not a perfect app, but it works for me with what I need to do, sending funds back and forth. Cash App is good for transferring small amounts, but if you are cashing out larger sums and you need it instantly, then the instant fees can be a bit pricey. Overall, it's been a very helpful app! No more trying to locate a moneygram or WU anymore!
data.replyText: Thanks for the kind post, Pamela. If you have questions or need help, you can reach out through our contact options here: https://help.cash.app/3128.

data.text: I like the card customization feature, but it feels like some unfinished demo because it feels like it's missing a few much needed settings. You can draw stuff onto your card, but for some reason in stead of being able to erase mistakes, they only gave a delete last action button. You can't change the color or size of the drawing tool, and there's no option to add various resizable shapes (can't draw perfect shapes by hand). It also really should have the ability to insert custom images as well.

data.text: I bet 90% of you people that have left negative feedback haven't updated your app and have been having problems. The problems I have had in the past were corrected when I updated. The newer people having problems I don't know for sure since I'm not a tech or programmer. The app is not useless you people are just impatient. Update.. I have two accounts I can send money to but I never know which one it will go to. There should be a button for that. I am getting very upset with that issue.
data.replyText: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. If there is something we can improve, and you want to tell us about it. Don't hesitate to talk to us through this link: http://help.cash.app/3128.

data.text: After over a year of usage of the app, my account was abruptly deactivated. I've already submitted a support ticket and they've taken approximately a month or over a month to address the issue. I did ask for updates about the case and failed to do so on more than one occasion. I haven't changed any usage of my account so it was puzzling to say the least and it's frustrating that their support team can't provide an answer after asking more than one time for an update. This is ridiculous

data.text: Lately, I have uninstalled to install the app in hopes it will work properly. I've cleared the cache, powered off my device & still I receive the notice that " something went wrong please check your connection" with the options to "(close or try again)". I've tried both options and still the app will not load. Please fix this issue as this is causing a financial burden for me.

data.text: I used cash app for years. I've never had a negative experience up until recently. All of my transaction histories and people that I have done transactions with have disappeared from my account. My stock history has vanished. It shows I've made one transaction with the entire account and it saved one favorite. It's an absolute mystery as to why it seems 99% of all my data with this app including the past stock trades have just up and vanished. It's saddening and overall extremely disappointing.

data.text: A bug (I hope?) I keep experiencing is when I transfer money to my savings, the total amount doesn't update. I have no idea where the money went and I'm really concerned about that. for ex: I took out $86 from $370 in savings leaving me with $284. Spent $4 and sent the rest of the money back to my savings but the total in my savings is still reading $284. I tried reinstalling, clearing the cache, logging out and back in and it still hasn't updated.

I've tried to fix this with customer service and they just told me and my sponsor that they couldn't do anything, and overall just wasted our time. Big time waster. Fix this please!!!

WORST CUSTOMER SERVICE EVER! UNACCEPTABLE! I HOPE THEY GO BANKRUPT! App processes multiple transactions without warning! App sent 2 transactions, although I only set up 1. The app should be fixed, so it doesn't use 1 confirmation for multiple transactions. The non-customer support through the app and email continually asked for more info for 7hrs. Then they claim they can't help and never once tried to pick up the phone! POOR BUSINESS MODEL!

data.text: I really enjoy the simplicity and convenience of this app. The new round up feature is brilliant and I've already saved $9 in a couple weeks. I like having a separate savings account and the goal is a nice feature and well. But I am writing this review today to ask for a folder feature of sorts. Basically sub-savings account withing savings account. A feature where I can put X amount in my bills folder, Y amount in car payment folder, Z amount in my vacation folder. Savings with goals

We kindly invite you to reach us using this link: https://help.cash.app/3128, to provide you with further support.

data.text: It was fine up until recently when cashapp refuses to release any holds on hotels till after 31 days even after they told me to send the bill which I did they even told me yes I have all the documentation but still recommend I wait my 31 days and they refused to release the pending transaction. One time before I was charged from a random place and I wanted to dispute and they said they could not find the transaction when I was looking at in the app while we spoke and they didn't do anything.
data.replyText: Hello Jaimie, thank you for making this review. We certainly understand that this is not an ideal situation, we would like to continue working by your side. We kindly invite you to reach us using this link: https://help.cash.app/3128.

data.text: I have to uninstall and reinstall this app when I need to use it because when it's installed on my phone, it causes a window to constantly pop up, showing both my internet browser apps, wanting me to select one. When I click on either app, it takes me to the cash app website.... do annoying.
data.replyText: This may be really annoying, Nikki. We want to clarify that Cash App doesn't make pop-up ads so this situation should be addressed with your phone's manufacturer. If you have further questions or are still experiencing this issue, please do not hesitate to write back in. http://help.cash.app/3128.

data.text: Its been pretty bad so far i joined then i was also trying to get my fiance a account so i did the invite a friend for $10 and it made her go through more verification things than an actual bank does which is hella extra and really annoying let alone you have to pay $5 to even fully get the $10 dollars which we dont care about we just wanted the account but it also gave that option so we was like oo first bit of money on our account HA NOT! I got my acc closed now so not very happy
data.replyText: Hi there, we understand how important it is for you to be able to have a Cash App account for your fiancée and keep using your own account. Ensuring our customers receive the support they need is a top priority for us. We'd like to take a deeper look for you. You can get in touch with us here: http://help.cash.app/3128.

data.text: I used to love this until you had to add your debit card. I tried to ask customer service about why I had to but they had no answer just I can't help you further. I deleted my card from cash app because of that.

data.text: Contacted cashapp support but no help they said they had no information on when I would be eligible to deposit paper money again and they couldn't change it, even if I've used it before. data.text: this app is way too easy for hackers to access. I submitted my bank info and within 20 minutes another unknown account was added to mine. be VERY careful. check your information regularly!! Update, very responsive and helpful. With any financial institution please protect your account. I cannot say it's the fault of this business everyone is a target.
data.replyText: This is troubling to hear, Shana. We are committed to your security and finding an unknown bank is not ideal. We'll continue to work hard to improve this. Additionally, you can review this information to further protect your account: http://help.cash.app/3127. Feel free to contact us here: https://cash.app/contact if necessary.

data.text: Why is cash app opening my web browser every single time I wake up my screen? I already have the app downloaded, every pop up blocker is turned on, no permissions. I've Uninstalled this app, the browser app, restarted my phone. If I could give less than one star for how annoying it is to have 17 tabs opened, I would.
data.replyText: We hear you, and we fully understand how frustrating these situations can be with these tabs opening in your browse, Elizabeth. Please be sure you’re using the most up-to-date version of your phone’s operating system, if you need more assistance contact us here: https://cash.app/contact and we will be happy to help.

data.text: They will take money from your account even though the merchant has released the hold. It doesn't matter if you have the final invoice from the merchant cashapp just tells you to contact the merchant when they are the one who steal money from your account. I have been a loyal cashapp customer for almost 7 years until now. They are rude and brush your concerns off like you don't matter. I wish there was an option to Give them 0 stars. I wish I could tell the whole story but there isn't space!
data.replyText: Hey Kayla, we can assure you that Cash App will never steal from our customers. Keeping accounts secure and the app safe is a top priority to us.
